summary: The Dragonborn needs something more than a lap dog.
descriptionHtml:
Meeko is taller, larger and [b][u]essential[/u][/b]. Cleaned, tested and kissed. Ready for use.

[img]http://www.image-share.com/upload/2211/280.jpg[/img]

Meeko\'s found south of Solitude, just go to the little mill down the hill, cross the lake down south and his shack (Litteraly \"Meeko\'s Shack\") is found near a keep with some mages and skeletons. If you find the shack before seeing the dog, he\'s waiting for someone to come by on the main road that would lead to the house, and then starts walking towards his shack. [b][u]brysonaikilyu[/u][/b]

[img]http://www.image-share.com/upload/2211/281.jpg[/img]

Install: Unzip the mod to the game\'s \"\\Data\" folder. Activate the plugin \"Mighty Meeko.esp\" in the launcher.

[b][u]* Having Meeko indoors most likely cause clipping and stucking issues.[/u][/b]

HOWEVER YOU MUST DOWNLOAD THE MOD BELOW FOR ULTIMATE BADARSE MACHO EXPERIENCE DOG COMPANION!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1724]Make dog companions into wolf companions[/url] by [b]Bellyache[/b] & uploaded by [b]wrig675[/b]

Follow the instructions: download a mesh file then choose a skin file and please endorse that mod because is just amazing.

The Mesh and Skin I used were:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/8786]Dogs to Wolves - Eyeless Version[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/8796]Custom - Husky skins[/url]

But you can choose any you want. No matter which all will work with my mod and no conflicts. But choose only one set of Meshes and Skins else they will override each other.

EDIT: Screenshots, better description and fixed links.
author: Joollio
